briefTitle: PrevaLence of Albuminuria in Patients With CARdiovascular Disease and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in China: a National Cross-sectional Study
officialTitle: PrevaLence of Albuminuria in Patients With CARdiovascular Disease and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus in China: a National Cross-sectional Study

primary.description: To assess the prevalence of albuminuria in patients who are combined with type 2 diabetes mellitus and different cardiovascular diseases in inpatient and outpatient cardiology departments of secondary and tertiary hospitals in China.
primary.timeFrame: On the day of patients enrollment.

secondary.measure: Lthe prevalence of microalbuminuria and macroalbuminuria evels of microalbuminuria and macroalbuminuria
secondary.description: To evaluate the levels of microalbuminuria and macroalbuminuria of patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM) in inpatients and outpatients cardiology departments;
secondary.timeFrame: On the day of patients enrollment.

secondary.measure: The prevalence of microalbuminuria and macroalbuminuria
secondary.description: To evaluate the prevalence of microalbuminuria and macroalbuminuria in patients with T2DM complicated with different cardiovascular diseases
secondary.timeFrame: On the day of patients enrollment.

secondary.measure: To evaluate the related influence factors of albuminuria and the treatment patterns of CKD patients and non-CKD patients in cardiology departments;
secondary.description: After outpatient patients receive feedback on their renal function tests, assess whether physicians prescribe new relevant medical orders by recording them. Evaluate the treatment patterns for CKD and non-CKD patients in the cardiology department.
secondary.timeFrame: On the day of patients enrollment.

secondary.measure: Evaluate the management of patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus and cardiovascular disease across different levels of cardiology departments in hospitals.
secondary.description: Collect clinical assessment data from patients (including test results and the frequency of these tests over the past year), and assess the management of patient-related risk factors and complications by physicians in hospitals of different levels based on the frequency of testing.
secondary.timeFrame: On the day of patients enrollment.

other.description: To evaluate the prevalence of retinopathy in T2DM patients with different cardiovascular diseases attending inpatient and outpatient cardiology departments in secondary and tertiary hospitals in China.
other.timeFrame: On the day of patients enrollment.
